physical_appearance:This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a soldier in uniform and headgear
 standing in the midlde of a barren land. Behind him
 there are several small roofed buildings. The top of the photograph shows a section of a leaf canopy. The photograph is slightly folded along the corners
 and is stained at the top-left corner.

sgcool_label_text:A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony
 this collection is part of the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.

metadata.title_text: Group of 50 photographs of P.O.W James Steele and regiment when stationed in Malaysia in 1941 (and 2 later photographs of Steele placing a wreath at ceremony of remembrance)  Soldier at Naval Base Singapore Island
metadata.physical_appearance: This is a black-and-white photograph. It features a soldier in uniform and headgear, standing in the midlde of a barren land. Behind him, there are several small roofed buildings. The top of the photograph shows a section of a leaf canopy. The photograph is slightly folded along the corners, and is stained at the top-left corner.
metadata.subject_terms_2: World War, 1939-1945 Photography Soldiers Postcards Singapore Naval Base
metadata.context_7: Great Britain. Army. Royal Field Artillery
metadata.sgcool_label_text: A variety of portraits of British soldiers that show them at leisure as well as two photographs of James Steele placing a wreath at a remembrance ceremony, this collection is part of the archive of James Steele, Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942, when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
